children.text: Makes the player always face the opponent when they are on the ground. Doesn't swap in the air
Mirroring code is the same for player2 just using player 1 as the target
Dash activates if the player is holding O and the direction of the opponent. Stops the player from having dash physics regardless of direction
Dashing properties. Could be changed for other characters by adding other variables
Instant acceleration when walking makes the game feel more responsive
Idle when no key is pressed
Code generally same for P2 but the keys are changed based on arcade controls
Adjusts air speed based on dash or walk speed.
Not instant acceleration in the air makes air drift and jumping slightly more comital as you can instantly drift out of anti air range. No deceleration makes the arc perfectly parabolic
The drift is larger if the player neutral jumps. Forward jumps should be more comittal, but neutral jumps shouldn't allow the player to drift in from an absurd range
Adjusts air speed based on dash or walk speed.
Not instant acceleration in the air makes air drift and jumping slightly more comital as you can instantly drift out of anti air range. No deceleration makes the arc perfectly parabolic
The drift is larger if the player neutral jumps. Forward jumps should be more comittal, but neutral jumps shouldn't allow the player to drift in from an absurd range
Switch back to keyboard. On C pressed
Conditions make it so you can only air dash once while in the air
Timer makes the airdash perfectly horizontal
Airdash speed properties
Airdash resets on contact with the ground
Changes walk physics back to default on the ground
Makes the player instantly accelerate forward if dashing after walking backward. No awkward waiting for the acceleration to override the backward velocity
